attributes.action: Brexit: Dissolve this sitting of Parliament and call a General Election
attributes.additional_details:
Whether you voted leave or remain, you didn't vote for us to leave the EU in disarray, with no deal, putting many peoples livelihoods and living situations at risk.

We must immediately dissolve parliament and hold a general election to try and break the political deadlock.

 



​
attributes.background:
The Brexit process has crippled our political system. At the end of two years, the minority ruling party is divided, the main opposition party have suggested an alternative and the deal we have negotiated is almost universally opposed in three votes.
​
